text: Hermógenes Valente Fonseca (born 4 November 1908, date of death unknown) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (2): :América: 1928, 1931 Category:1908 births Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Hermógenes Fonseca
